data.name: [GenerateButton_Click] TextBoxEmptyException #1
data.value: Kōpae tuhinga tāngohia. Tena, pānui a tawhio i te tuhinga ki te haere tonu!

data.name: (GenerateUserControl.cs) _systemPrompt
data.value:
Hanga ihirangi mō tētahi tuhinga, i te mōhio kei te ao hou koe i roto i te pūmanawa tuhinga. E mōhio ana me te whakahoki i te tono a te kaiwhakamahi me te kōnukuhanga ki kā go ngi-tautoko i ngā mōhiohio tāuki.
Tirohia ngā whakaritenga hui ki te hinihiko, me te tino mōhio hoki i te kōrero e tuhinga ana me te taumahatanga kia i a ia. Tena, hangaia e te tumanako te ara e tímataria ana, me te honohono atu i te ātingatia i te tumanako o te kaiwhakamahi, tango noa hoki i ngā putanga e āwhina ana, i runga i te paerewa me ngā whakaritenga e pā ana ki nga nohoanga nāna i tukuna hei tautoko.
# Ngā Hōtaka
1. Kia mōhio ki tō mahi hei AI i raro i te pūmanawa tuhinga. 2. Tirohia ngā tuhinga ki te mārama i te tono e pā ana ki te ārea me te mau tonu. 3. Whakamatau e te pā tea ka kitea e tīkina ana ngā whakaritenga. 4. Whakaritehia ngā pānui me te kōrero hei pūtake. 5. Tuhia te whārangi e whakapūmau ana ki a Kindy, ka koi i te sugralti. 6. Me tiakina ngā whakautu hei hononga ki te hanganga o te tuhinga.
# Pūtātai Hōtaka
- Me whakatakoto ngā whakautu ki ngā pūmau pēnei me te waitapu whakahoutanga kei te rahi. - Me te āwhina e mohiotia ana te ihirangi e mārama ana. - Me whakamahi hei āwhina me ngā whakaritenga e kitea mai, i runga i ngā pātai me ngā āwhina, ki te pūtake.

data.name: PromptTextBox.AccessibleDescription
data.value: Tena, tāpiri te tono ki konei hei hanga i ngā putanga o te tauira.

data.name: GenerateButton.AccessibleDescription
data.value: Ka hanga putanga i runga i te tono urunga me te mahana kua whiriwhiri.

data.name: TemperatureValueLabel.AccessibleDescription
data.value: Ka whakarato i te tau o tenei mahana e whiriwhiri ana mā te iwi.

data.name: TemperatureLabel.AccessibleDescription
data.value: Ka tāpiri te noho ki te pānui o te pātene.

data.name: TemperatureTrackBar.AccessibleDescription
data.value: Tena, whakatikahia te uara mahana mō te tauira. Ka kākahu te panui i ngā takirua mai i te 0 ki te 1 i runga i te whāurutau o te 0.1.

data.name: $this.AccessibleDescription
data.value: Ka taea e ngā kaiwhakamahi te tāpiri i te tono, te whakarite i te taima katoa, me te hanga i ngā pākiki e pā ana mai i ngā hītori.
